rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors with noise/grain.
Use the 'Green Energy' (#B0E301) for primary CTAs and active states.
Use 'Purple' (#6441a5) for AI features and secondary accents.
Text over images must use a hard drop-shadow or heavy scrim.

body.description: Geometric modern sans, readable but distinct

mono.description: For stats, numbers, and data displays

effects: Glitch effect on hover for major headings

buttons.primary: bg-[#B0E301] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-[#C5F22B] hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(176,227,1,0.4)] transition-all active:translate-y-1 rounded-sm
buttons.secondary: border border-[#6441a5] text-white hover:bg-[#6441a5]/20 uppercase tracking-wider rounded-sm

cards.stat: bg-[#0F0F0F] border border-white/5 p-6 hover:border-[#B0E301]/50 transition-colors group relative

inputs.default: bg-black border border-white/10 focus:border-[#B0E301] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#B0E301] rounded-sm text-white placeholder:text-gray-600

navigation.sidebar: fixed left-0 h-full bg-[#050505] border-r border-white/10 w-64 transform transition-transform z-50
navigation.mobile_menu: fixed inset-0 bg-black/95 backdrop-blur-xl z-50 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-8

rules: No bouncy springs. Use snappy, linear or slight ease-out curves.
Hover states should be instant or very fast (100ms).
Page transitions: Slide up or Glitch in.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5 or 2. Sharp edges preferred.
icons.custom: Use pixel-art SVGs for badges or achievements if possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. FONT SETUP: Install 'Rajdhani' and 'Outfit' from Google Fonts immediately in index.css.
2. THEME ENFORCEMENT: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors provided (#B0E301, #6441a5, #050505).
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Home' dashboard as a BENTO GRID. Stats at top, Workouts left, Meals right.
4. GAMIFICATION: Add a 'Level/XP' bar in the sidebar or header. Use purple for the progress fill.
5. PIXEL TOUCH: Use a pixel-font for the 'FITQUEST' logo text if not using an image.
6. MOBILE: Ensure the sidebar transforms into a slide-over menu on mobile. Use Shadcn Sheet or custom.
7. CHARTS: Use Recharts for performance. Style axes to be invisible or very subtle. Lines should be Neon Green.
8. MEAL GEN: Make this section look like a 'Laboratory'. Use Purple accents and glass cards.
9. TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.

do_not_use: Gradients on text (unless for very specific 'Magic' effects)
Rounded-xl or Rounded-2xl (stick to Rounded-md or Rounded-sm for the tech feel)
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text on the neon green is BLACK, not white. Text on purple can be White.
universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
